page.title: 18ATTITUDES CLAPHAM VILLAGE
page.content: Some of the children from the village school devised a questionnaire to find out the attitude of some of the inhabitants to the village of Clapham. Heidi Dodsworth interviewed her grandfather. Q.How long have you lived in the village?A.I have lived in this village 7 years. Q.What do you enjoy most about Clapham?A.The friendly community in a rural setting. Q.Would you prefer to live in a busy town ?A.NO. Q.What needs inproving ?A.Electric lighting is recquired on the road ways,while the river banks could be inproved. Q.Is it convenient for the elderly ?A.Yes but a better bus service would be appreciated for the eldely who cannot drive.
